name: Find your Way (itch) (Mythological)
description:
Description:

You are a square in a dark ambient, alone, you can't see too many things. However, if you follow the music you'll find a light.

How to play:

Left and Right arrows move the character.                                                                                                  Spacebar: Jump

If you keep the arrows pressed on the wall and press "jump" the character will climb forever, use it in your favor. Double jump only if you were on the wall.

I made this alone and it's my first game, have fun, i apologize for the english, and if you liked the game write a comment, i'll really appreciate, if you don't, write a complaint in the comments.

Thanks for playing.
